subject: New York City Marathon
Hurricane Sandy (2012)
lead_paragraph: Mary Wittenberg, director of the New York City Marathon, realized that many did not see the race as a help, but rather as an insensitive romp through the wounds of a natural disaster.
snippet: Mary Wittenberg, director of the New York City Marathon, realized that many did not see the race as a help, but rather as an insensitive romp through the wounds of a natural disaster.
